Container.Name: amp

Branch.TagDescription: alpine image with glibc, tiny image but only java servers will work!
ubuntu image (limited to java servers at this time)

Container.Overview: AMP (Application Management Panel)(https://cubecoders.com/AMP) - a simple to use and easy to install control panel and management system for hosting game servers.

Config.Name: Port: 25565
Config.Description: placeholder minecraft port (add more as required)

Config.Name: USERNAME
Config.Description: Specify a username for the webUI

Config.Name: PASSWORD
Config.Description: Specify a password for the webUI

Config.Name: LICENCE
Config.Description: Specify a valid license for AMP

Config.Name: JAVA_VERSIONS
Config.Description: you can have multiple versions specified seperated by a comma

Config.Name: MODULE
Config.Description: Which Module to use for the main instance created by this image

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: UID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: GID for permissions. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.

Config.Name: UMASK
Config.Description: UMASK for newly created files. Do not change unless you know what you're doing.
